doc:
William C. Dowlan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_C._Dowlan 0 William C. Dowlan (September 21, 1882–November 6, 1947) was an American stage performer and a film actor and director during the silent era. Most of his directorial projects were done in collaboration with his wife, screenwriter Leonora Ainsworth. Between 1915 and 1917 he and Ainsworth did extensive work together for Universal Film Manufacturing Company in Los Angeles and for the American Film Company at its facilities in Santa Barbara. William_C._Dowlan ( September_21_,_1882 – November_6_,_1947 ) was an_American_stage_performer and a_film_actor_and_director during the_silent_era . Most of his_directorial_projects were_done in collaboration with his_wife , screenwriter_Leonora_Ainsworth . Between 1915_and_1917 he and Ainsworth did extensive_work together for Universal_Film_Manufacturing_Company in Los_Angeles and for the_American_Film_Company at its_facilities in Santa_Barbara .
